function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exclusion of temporary migrants from economic stimulus and welfare packages","Impact":"Difficulty in supporting themselves, potential homelessness, pressure to work when sick, public health risks including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Inclusion of temporary migrants in economic stimulus and welfare packages, provision of support for financial stability and health care","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Temporary migrants","Owner":"Government, policy makers"},{"Description":"Creation of an underclass of migrant workers","Impact":"Public health risks including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Policies to address the social and economic disparities among migrant workers, provision of support for health care and financial stability","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Migrant workers, public","Owner":"Government, policy makers"},{"Description":"Limited utility of new policy measures for temporary migrants","Impact":"Inadequate support for temporary migrants, potential financial instability and health risks","Mitigation":"Development of targeted and effective policy measures, addressing specific challenges faced by temporary migrants, enforcement of employer obligations","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Temporary migrants, international students, gig workers","Owner":"Government, policy makers"}]}
